article.title: Lockheed Martin Awarded Contract for Management, Engineering Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin Maritime Systems and Sensors is being awarded a $13.5 million modification to a previously awarded contract for management and engineering services to maintain and modify as necessary the design of DDG 51-class combat system compartments and topside arrangements in support of the program executive officer Integrated Warfare Systems.
